column5: Fished with a good friend today and hooked into a pile.... Here's just a few
Great looking fish.   Nice job man
Very nice!  bly
wow that was fast, good day today Mr solo.  I ll post some of mine later on have some cleaning up to do.
NICE JOB!!! CUSTOM REEL????
WTG man .I like the shots of the fish in the water
RIGHT ON.  ..THATS WHAT I CALL A GREAT DAY OF FISHING ......  ..NICE BROWN AS WELL GREAT PICTURES TOO .WAY TO GO...CHEERS
Awesome!! Love the Brown pic..

a few more from the day, it was cold in the am but warmed up quite nice, good to finally have the long stick out  mid way through the afternoon though I get the dreaded call that any parent doesnt want to get, seems my son broke his hand, knocked the wind out fast, but solo in fine fashion keep the spirits up   leaving the river talk to a guy who really didnt have any roe so I was glad to help out and gave him the rest of my roe hopefully he hit some fish too  Enjoy the pictures
awesome pics
The pictures are stunning, great report!
Nice...
Yep, Al Taylor pin....  Thank's everyone, it really was a great day!
Way to go guys....awesome fish and pics.  It sure was a nice day to be out fishing yesterday afternoon.  Jason
Yeah, that phone call was a bit disconcerting, but he's tough (like his old man  ), he'll be okay.
ohh ya Im sure, but it puts a kink in his baseball, his practices started last week and its going to be tough with him sitting watching
What a day. Nice fish man. I can't wait to get into them like that.
Nice pics guys, thanks for posting.
Hope his hands heals trouble free and quickly!  bly

Wow !!! Amazing pics solo .. sound like an awesome day.... I was gonna get out but was called to do emergency laptop surgery .... thinking oh well the tribs are gonna be all 'blown' as CC said .... but ...that trib doesnt look too 'blown out' at all ... almost clear to me ....  Geeze .. now I gotta re-arrange my plans for this week
nice fish! Thanks for sharing.
